Hey guys , IÃ‚Â´m new to the forum. Just one question: How do i post images ?

Sorry for that question, i am sure the answer was written down here somewhere, but ist hard to find it if youÃ‚Â´re new

First of all, you need (as far as I know) more than 5 posts before you get full forum privaleges. Otherwise, use a site like Imgur or Tinypic to upload pictures. Copy the BBCode and paste it in your post. Hope this helps.

Welcome to the forums!
I use photo bucket, i signed a account and started posting pics by dragging them into my profile.
